key_compatibility.related_product: all agencies for safe packaging require that batteries be packaged in a manner that prevents short circuits and be contained in "strong outer packaging" that prevents spillage of contents
the dangerous goods regulations provided they meet the requirements contained in the following special provisions
of dangerous quantities of heat and meet the special provisions listed above
